title: v1.6.3.5-v2 Quick Tab State Sync Fixes
details:
Version 1.6.3.5-v2 fixed 16 critical Quick Tab state synchronization bugs:

KEY ARCHITECTURE CHANGES:
1. originTabId - Each Quick Tab now tracks which browser tab created it. This prevents cross-tab contamination where Quick Tabs would appear on wrong tabs. The storage.onChanged listener filters by originTabId before rendering.

2. STORAGE_READ_DEBOUNCE_MS - Reduced from 300ms to 50ms for faster UI updates.

3. DOM Verification - Restore operations now verify DOM presence before updating UI indicators. Uses DOM_VERIFICATION_DELAY_MS (500ms) constant.

4. Tab ID Logging - All logs now include [Tab ID] prefix via _logPrefix property in VisibilityHandler.

FILES CHANGED:
- manifest.json (version 1.6.3.5-v2)
- sidebar/quick-tabs-manager.js (debounce, origin filtering, DOM verification)
- src/utils/storage-utils.js (originTabId serialization)
- src/features/quick-tabs/handlers/CreateHandler.js (originTabId support)
- src/features/quick-tabs/index.js (cross-tab filtering helpers)
- src/features/quick-tabs/handlers/VisibilityHandler.js (Tab ID logging)

CRITICAL PATTERNS:
- _shouldRenderOnThisTab() checks originTabId before rendering
- serializeTabForStorage() includes originTabId field
- Restore operations use pendingClearSnapshots for atomic snapshot clearing
